{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 802.11n USB Dongle |caption2 = |pp = http://www.zowee.com.cn/en/product/Detail.asp?ID=217&MaxID=3 |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Zowee |model = WL-370G-C |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = corded dongle |vendor_id = 148f |device_id = 2770 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |oui = 00:FD:07 |chip1 = Ralink;RT2770; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2720; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The particular device populating this entry has no label or model indicator.. but it looks exactly like the '''Zowee''' WL-370G-C pictured in the above product page. Additionally, the 00:FD:07 seems to be used by some other '''Zowee''' manufactured devices. :A Wi-Fi b/g/n logo and "USB 2.0 802.11n" is printed on the top of the device's shell. ==Notes== ===dmesg dump=== 
[91494.755688] usb 1-3: new high-speed USB device number 6 using ehci-pci

[91494.907472] usb 1-3: Manufacturer: Ralink
[91494.907480] usb 1-3: SerialNumber: 1.0
[91495.023369] usb 1-3: reset high-speed USB device number 6 using ehci-pci
[91495.194397] phy3 -> rt2x00_set_chip: Info - Chipset detected - rt: 2860, rf: 0003, rev: 0102.
[91495.195232] ieee80211 phy3: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
[91496.263968] phy3 -> rt2x00lib_request_firmware: Info - Loading firmware file 'rt2870.bin'.
[91496.264063] phy3 -> rt2x00lib_request_firmware: Info - Firmware detected - version: 0.29.
[91496.499390] IPv6: ADDRCONF(NETDEV_UP): wlan85: link is not ready
